statements: SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_id, asset_title FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_title, asset_url FROM content_assets WHERE asset_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT asset_id, asset_url FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type = 'video' AND asset_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE asset_title LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_title, asset_url FROM content_assets WHERE asset_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT asset_id, asset_title FROM content_assets WHERE asset_title LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM content_assets WHERE asset_type <> 'video' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) AS asset_count FROM content_assets GROUP BY asset_type;
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, date_published FROM articles
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_url FROM assets
SELECT author, content, date_published FROM articles ORDER BY date_published DESC
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'image'
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE date_published > '2021-01-01'
SELECT title, author FROM articles ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT article_id, content, author FROM articles WHERE author LIKE '%John%'
SELECT articles.title, assets.asset_type FROM articles JOIN assets ON articles.article_id = assets.article_id
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING num_articles > 1
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT content FROM articles WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_url, alt_text FROM images ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE uploader_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE author_id = 123;
SELECT image_url, alt_text FROM images WHERE uploaded_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, author_id, created_at FROM articles JOIN images ON articles.author_id = images.uploaded_by;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE author_id = 100;
SELECT image_url, alt_text FROM images WHERE size > 100;
SELECT * FROM videos ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT title, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id = 5;

SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 5;
SELECT image_url, alt_text FROM images WHERE size > 100;
SELECT title, duration FROM videos WHERE video_url LIKE '%youtube.com%';
SELECT a.title, v.title FROM articles a JOIN videos v ON a.author_id = v.duration;

SELECT title, author_id FROM articles ORDER BY author_id DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, url FROM images WHERE uploader_id = 3 ORDER BY url ASC;

SELECT * FROM images WHERE title LIKE '%nature%';
SELECT title FROM videos WHERE creator_id = 5 ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT articles.title, images.title FROM articles JOIN article_images ON articles.article_id = article_images.article_id JOIN images ON article_images.image_id = images.image_id;
